title: Okey Game SFX Pack
description: Pick from 112 sounds of collecting, pouring and arranging of Okey pieces and dropping, hitting, pushing sounds of an Okey wooden board. This collection is ideal for anybody searching for high-quality board game sounds.
longDescription:
In this Okey SFX Pack, we offer you the unique sounds of the famous game Okey, which is a mixture of rummy and mahjong. You can find sounds of Okey pieces, wood board and dice from the game. All the sounds you want to find in an okey game and many other board game genres are available in here.


Pick from 112 sounds of collecting, pouring and arranging of Okey pieces and dropping, hitting, pushing sounds of an Okey wooden board. This collection is ideal for anybody searching for high-quality board game sounds.


112 sounds of in stereo, 16bit-48kHz .WAV, with a multitude of performances. Flipping, dice rolling, spilling, dropping, shaking, rolling, spinning pieces, wood and plastic boards and more. They come in hard, soft, slow, medium pace, random, single, handful, in varied speeds, and different holders and with easy to navigate naming.


The texture of the sounds is clean, realistic, and flexible for customization. Plus, you get the usual Vadi Sound craft and attention to detail! You can now set the bar higher for all your Foley needs, multi-genre, adventure or slot games, motion and video projects!


Keywords including Actions, Parts, Equipment and Style


Okey Board game dropping hitting pushing flipping, dice rolling, spilling, dropping, shaking, rolling, spinning pieces, wood and plastic boards casino slot overturn finish arranging dragging table dice bag playing cloth shuffling collecting hand.
